title: Big closets plus towel & linen, eSports Center
posting_body: Relax and enjoy our West Covina apartments in a pet-friendly and gated-access community.
Torrey Pines features spacious 1-, 2-, and 3-bedroom floor plans with private patios/balconies, an in-unit washer/dryer, and many newly renovated luxury amenities.
Our apartment homes offer you access to a playground, state-of-the-art fitness center, swimming pools and spa, and an exciting new eSports Center.
Centrally located between San Bernardino, Orange, and Los Angeles Counties, our West Covina apartments are just minutes away from the best recreation in Southern California.
We are committed to meeting the highest standard of apartment living
and we ensure that the resident benefits at Torrey Pines exceed those of other West Covina apartment communities.
Torrey Pines WiFi in each unit
For more information, visit us at: <URL>
Pricing and availability are subject to change.
